id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*

pin_a.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the [float output](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) connected to Pin A (alternatively IN1, etc.) of the h-bridge.



*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*

pin_b.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the [float output](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) connected to Pin B (alternatively IN2, etc.) of the h-bridge.



*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*

decay_mode.docs:
**string**: The decay mode you want to use with the h-bridge. Either `slow` (braking) or `fast` (coasting). Defaults to `slow`.



*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*

speed_count.docs:
**int**: Set the number of supported discrete speed levels. The value is used to calculate the percentages for each speed. E.g. `2` means that you have 50% and 100% while `100` will allow 1% increments in the output. Defaults to `100`.



*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*

enable_pin.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the [float output](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) connected to the Enable pin of the h-bridge (if h-bridge uses enable).



*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*

brake.docs:
Set all h-bridge pins high, shorting the fan/motor’s windings and forcing the motor to actively stop.

*See also: [H-bridge Fan](https://esphome.io/components/fan/hbridge.html#fan-hbridge-brake-action)*

pin_a.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the first float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for this light.



*See also: [H-bridge Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*

pin_b.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the second float [Output Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/index.html#output) to use for this light.



*See also: [H-bridge Light](https://esphome.io/components/light/hbridge.html#configuration-variables)*
